The theory behind the toolbox can be found in the paper, *"Incorporating External Green Infrastructure Models into Storm Water Management Model (SWMM) Simulations Using Interface Files"*. 

Visit this [GitHub repository](https://github.com/stsfk/swmm_gi_toolbox) for more information. Any questions, comments, and suggestions are welcomed.
